name: Descript
tagline: Audio and video editing software that works like a doc
description: Descript is a audio and video editing software that works like a doc. It allows you to edit media by editing text, making it incredibly easy to create and collaborate on video and podcast content.

pricingDetails.price: Free plan available, Creator from $12/month, Pro from $24/month, Business from $30/month
pricingDetails.description: Free plan with basic features, paid plans for advanced editing and team collaboration

name: Blender
tagline: Free and open-source 3D creation suite
description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D creation suite. It supports the entire 3D pipelineâ€”modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing and motion tracking, even video editing and game creation.

pricingDetails.price: Completely free and open-source
pricingDetails.description: Free to download and use with optional donations to support development

name: Adobe Creative Cloud
tagline: Collection of creative apps for photography, design, video, web, UX and more
description: Adobe Creative Cloud is a collection of 20+ desktop and mobile apps and services for photography, design, video, web, UX and more. It includes industry-standard tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, and many others.

pricingDetails.price: Single app from $20.99/month, All apps from $52.99/month, Enterprise custom pricing
pricingDetails.description: Various plans for individuals, students, teams, and enterprises

name: Asana
tagline: Project management tool for teams to stay organized and on track
description: Asana is a web and mobile collaborative work management app that helps teams organize, track, and manage their work. It enables teams to move work from start to finish with features like task assignments, timelines, and progress tracking.

pricingDetails.price: Free for teams up to 15, Premium from $10.99/user/month, Business from $24.99/user/month, Enterprise custom pricing
pricingDetails.description: Free plan for small teams, paid plans for advanced features and larger teams

name: Monday.com
tagline: Work operating system that powers teams to run projects and workflows
description: Monday.com is a cloud-based work operating system (Work OS) where teams create and manage workflows, projects, and processes. It provides a visual and intuitive platform for planning, organizing, and tracking team work.

pricingDetails.price: Basic from $8/user/month, Standard from $10/user/month, Pro from $16/user/month, Enterprise custom pricing
pricingDetails.description: Various plans for teams of all sizes with different feature sets

name: HubSpot
tagline: CRM platform with marketing, sales, customer service, and CMS tools
description: HubSpot is a CRM platform that connects everything scaling companies need to deliver a best-in-class customer experience into one place. It includes marketing, sales, customer service, and CMS tools.

pricingDetails.price: Free CRM available, Starter from $15/month, Professional from $800/month, Enterprise from $3,200/month
pricingDetails.description: Free CRM with basic features, paid plans for advanced marketing, sales, and service tools

name: Visual Studio Code
tagline: Free code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications
description: Visual Studio Code is a free source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded Git.

pricingDetails.price: Completely free
pricingDetails.description: Free to download and use

name: GitHub
tagline: Platform for developers to collaborate on code projects
description: GitHub is a platform for developers to collaborate on code projects. It provides distributed version control, source code management, bug tracking, feature requests, task management, and wikis for every project.

pricingDetails.price: Free for public repositories, Team from $4/user/month, Enterprise from $21/user/month
pricingDetails.description: Free for public repositories and limited private repositories, paid plans for advanced features

name: Ahrefs
tagline: SEO toolset for backlink analysis, keyword research, content marketing and competitor analysis
description: Ahrefs is an SEO toolset that provides professional tools for backlink analysis, keyword research, content marketing, and competitor analysis. It helps marketers and website owners improve their search engine rankings and organic traffic.

pricingDetails.price: Lite from $99/month, Standard from $199/month, Advanced from $399/month, Enterprise from $999/month
pricingDetails.description: Various subscription plans based on features and data limits

name: Mailchimp
tagline: Marketing platform for small businesses to create and manage their marketing
description: Mailchimp is a marketing platform for small businesses to create and manage their marketing. It provides tools for email marketing, social media advertising, landing pages, and marketing automation.

pricingDetails.price: Free for up to 500 contacts, Essentials from $11/month, Standard from $17/month, Premium from $299/month
pricingDetails.description: Free plan for small lists, paid plans for advanced features and larger audiences

name: Tableau
tagline: Data visualization and business intelligence tool
description: Tableau is a data visualization and business intelligence tool that helps people see and understand data. It enables users to create interactive dashboards, reports, and visualizations from various data sources.

pricingDetails.price: Creator from $70/user/month, Explorer from $42/user/month, Viewer from $15/user/month
pricingDetails.description: Subscription-based pricing with different tiers for creators, explorers, and viewers

name: QuickBooks
tagline: Accounting software for small businesses
description: QuickBooks is accounting software designed for small businesses. It offers on-premises accounting applications and cloud-based versions that accept business payments, manage and pay bills, and payroll functions.

pricingDetails.price: Simple Start from $25/month, Essentials from $50/month, Plus from $80/month, Advanced from $180/month
pricingDetails.description: Monthly subscription plans with increasing features and user limits

name: Udemy
tagline: Online learning and teaching marketplace
description: Udemy is an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 200,000 courses and 54 million students. It allows instructors to create courses on various topics and students to learn at their own pace.

pricingDetails.price: Individual courses from $10-200, Udemy Business from $16.58/user/month
pricingDetails.description: Courses are priced individually, Udemy Business for enterprise training

name: Fitbit
tagline: Wearable fitness tracking technology
description: Fitbit is a wearable fitness tracking technology that monitors heart rate, sleep, steps, and other personal metrics. It helps users track their fitness goals and maintain a healthy lifestyle through data-driven insights.

pricingDetails.price: Devices from $39.95, Fitbit Premium from $7.99/month
pricingDetails.description: Devices sold separately, Premium subscription for advanced features

name: Shopify
tagline: E-commerce platform for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems
description: Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to set up an online store and sell their products. It offers online retail point-of-sale systems, e-commerce website builders, and marketing tools.

pricingDetails.price: Basic from $29/month, Shopify from $79/month, Advanced from $299/month
pricingDetails.description: Monthly subscription plans with increasing features and sales limits

name: Grammarly
tagline: Writing assistant that reviews spelling, grammar, and punctuation
description: Grammarly is a writing assistant that reviews spelling, grammar, punctuation, clarity, engagement, and delivery mistakes. It helps users communicate more effectively by providing real-time suggestions.

pricingDetails.price: Free basic version, Premium from $12/month, Business from $15/user/month, Education free for schools
pricingDetails.description: Free basic grammar checking, Premium for advanced features, Business for teams

name: 1Password
tagline: Password manager and digital vault
description: 1Password is a password manager and digital vault that stores and manages passwords, credit cards, and other sensitive information. It helps users create strong passwords and keep their digital life secure.

pricingDetails.price: Individual from $2.99/month, Family from $4.99/month, Team from $7.99/user/month, Business from $7.99/user/month
pricingDetails.description: Various plans for individuals, families, and businesses

name: Unity
tagline: Real-time 3D development platform
description: Unity is a real-time 3D development platform that enables creators to build and operate interactive, real-time 3D content for 2D, 3D, VR and AR games and experiences. It's used by developers to create games, automotive, architecture, and more.

pricingDetails.price: Personal free for revenue under $100K, Plus from $20/month, Pro from $150/month, Enterprise custom pricing
pricingDetails.description: Free for small developers, paid plans for advanced features and larger teams

name: Airbnb
tagline: Online marketplace for arranging or offering lodging
description: Airbnb is an online marketplace that connects people who want to rent out their homes with people who are looking for accommodations in specific locales. It offers a wide range of lodging options from apartments to unique properties.

pricingDetails.price: Free to browse, Hosts pay 3% service fee, Guests pay 0-20% service fee
pricingDetails.description: Guests pay service fees, hosts pay lower fees, varies by location and booking

name: Zillow
tagline: Online real estate database and marketplace
description: Zillow is an online real estate database and marketplace that provides information on homes, apartments, and other properties. It offers property listings, home values, and tools for buyers, sellers, and renters.

pricingDetails.price: Free for consumers, Premier Agent for real estate professionals from $299/month
pricingDetails.description: Free for consumers, paid plans for real estate professionals
